alert.note: Alert for Inland Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 29 at 4:46AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...MODERATE SNOW MOVING ACROSS BERKELEY COUNTY... A band of moderate snow extending from Saint Stephen to Cordesville will move southeast at 10 to 15 mph across eastern portions of Berkeley County and upper Charleston County through 530 AM. Locations from Alvin to Bethera and Awendaw could see a quick 1/2 inch of snow. This snow could rapidly accumulate on grassy areas and other elevated surfaces.
info.instruction: If you plan to drive or walk, remain alert for slick spots on paved surfaces. Slow your driving speed and use care when walking on sidewalks, driveways or parking lots. Slips and falls constitute a leading cause of injuries during winter weather.
